title: All Financial Questions Answered - And More On Long-Term Care Insurance
teaser: Tune in for a special all-questions-answered edition of On Your Money. Joy Cardin and financial planner Kevin McKinley address your personal finance inquiries. They also discuss paying for long-term care insurance, the pros and cons of home short-sales, and using a Roth IRA to pay off debts.
